Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of the child kidnapping incident by stating that two women kidnapped three children, when in fact it was only one minor girl who was suspected of kidnapping.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to validate the existence of the "Mummy Mido" gang or their presence in Pali.

Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the incident, such as the possibility that the young woman and her companions were innocent and mistakenly accused of child kidnapping.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that only one minor girl was involved in the incident, while stating that two women were caught by locals.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing consistent and accurate information, as it mentions different dates and times for the incident.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the provided claim.
